1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Functions for changes between two datasets.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Change
6  (
7    -- * Minus
8    minusInput,
9    minusInputJudge,
10    minusJudge,
11  
12    -- * Update
13    updateInput,
14    updateJudge,
15  
16    -- * Changeset
17    -- $Changeset
18  ) where
19
20import qualified Data.Set                              as S
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                  as D
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core                  as C
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Writer                as W
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Input as L
26
27
28
29-- ----------------------  Minus
30
31-- | Read, calculate, and write judges /B/ minus /A/.
32minusInput
33    :: L.Input   -- ^ /B:/ Source of base section
34    -> L.Input   -- ^ /A:/ Source of altered section
35    -> IO B.ExitCode
36minusInput inputA inputB =
37    do js <- minusInputJudge inputA inputB
38       putStr . unlines . B.texts $ minusHead inputA inputB
39       putStrLn ""
40       W.putJudgesWith (B.exitCode 0) js
41
42-- | Read and calculate judges subtraction.
43minusInputJudge :: L.Input -> L.Input -> IO [C.JudgeC]
44minusInputJudge inputA inputB =
45    do [textA, textB] <- L.readInputs [inputA, inputB]
46       return $ L.readJudge textA `minusJudge` L.readJudge textB
47
48-- | Calculate subtraction of judges.
49minusJudge :: (Ord c) => [D.Judge c] -> [D.Judge c] -> [D.Judge c]
50minusJudge judA judB = map D.denyJudge judC ++ judD where
51    setA = S.fromList judA
52    setB = S.fromList judB
53    judC = S.toList $ setB `S.difference` setA
54    judD = S.toList $ setA `S.difference` setB
55
56minusHead :: L.Input -> L.Input -> B.CommentDoc
57minusHead inputA inputB =
58    B.CommentDoc
59    [ B.CommentSec "DATASETS"
60      [ "There are changes C when altering dataset B into A." 
61      , ""
62      , "  B (base)    : " ++ L.inputText inputB
63      , "  A (altered) : " ++ L.inputText inputA
64      , "  C (change)  : A - B" ]
65    , B.CommentSec "UPDATE"
66      [ "Dataset A is obtained by updating B by C."
67      , "Please execute: koshu-change B -u C" ]]
68
69
70
71-- ----------------------  Update
72
73-- | Calculate and write judges /B/ update by /C/.
74updateInput
75    :: L.Input   -- ^ /B:/ Source of base section
76    -> L.Input   -- ^ /C:/ Source of change section
77    -> IO B.ExitCode  -- ^ 
78updateInput inputB inputC =
79    do [textB, textC] <- L.readInputs [inputB, inputC]
80       putStr . unlines . B.texts $ updateHead inputB inputC
81       putStrLn ""
82       W.putJudgesWith (B.exitCode 0) $ L.readJudge textB `updateJudge` L.readJudge textC
83
84-- | Apply change judges.
85updateJudge :: (Ord c) => [D.Judge c] -> [D.Judge c] -> [D.Judge c]
86updateJudge judB judC = judA where
87    setB = S.fromList $ judB
88    denC = S.fromList $ map D.affirmJudge $ filter D.isDenial judC
89    affC = S.fromList $ filter D.isAffirmative judC
90    judA = S.toList $ setB `S.difference` denC `S.union` affC
91
92updateHead :: L.Input -> L.Input -> B.CommentDoc
93updateHead inputB inputC =
94    B.CommentDoc
95    [ B.CommentSec "DATASETS"
96      [ "Updating dataset B by C, altered dataset A is obtained." 
97      , ""
98      , "  B (base)    : " ++ L.inputText inputB
99      , "  C (change)  : " ++ L.inputText inputC
100      , "  A (altered) : B + C" ]]
101
102
103-- ----------------------
104-- $Changeset
105--
106--  Rules for calculating changeset C = A - B.
107--  Altering dataset B into A, changeset C
108--  is calculated by the following rules.
109--  
110--  * Affirmed judge is in C if and only if
111--    the judge is not in A, and is in B.
112--  
113--  * Denied judge is in C if and only if
114--    the judge is not in B, and is in A.
115--  
116--  * Judge is not in C otherwise.
117--
118
